CustomField.description: If actual completion date is blank and the target completion date is in the past, objective is past due.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Actual_Completion_Date__c ) && TODAY() - Target_Completion_Date__c > 0, TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If actual completion date is blank and the target completion date is in the past, objective is past due.
CustomField.label: Past Due
